description.narrative: The proposed project will further support the supply of trade finance in EM countries by IFC sharing credit risk on trade finance activities with CACIB. Additionally, CACIB will commit to redeploy some of the capital released from the transaction to finance projects in EMs, which have an interesting social benefit. Thus CACIB and IFC aim at bringing more value to the Project, IFC incentivizing the Bank to support financing activities in EM which have an interesting social impact. Subject to the further development and standardization of Social Bond markets, this may pave the way to then refinancing those assets under potential Social Bonds issuance in the perspective of mutual collaboration between both institutions which have been coordinating together the Social Bond Working Group, under the remit of the Green Bond Principles, during the last 2 years.
